Notes: Pioneer moved to "Physics & Astronomy" but included here
Pioneer in "Physics & Astronomy" account but included here
Restructured program consolidated Planetary Exploration and Physics and Astronomy accounts. No distinct Planetary request.
Reported "Actuals" contain DSN since they were reported in the FY2004 PBR.
First year that DSN costs are included in the solar system exploration division. Program restructuring once again breaks out planetary-related programs.
NASA moves to full-cost accounting for all projects.
Solar System Exploration Division created from Mars, Lunar, and Solar System divisions. NASA moves to CJS from VA/HUD appropriations.
Full-year CR. Final year of DSN costs in Solar Sytem/Planetary account.
Solar System Exploration renamed to Planetary Science Division. DSN moves to Heliophysics. NEOO moves to Exploration Systems Mission Directorate.
NEO Observation program moves to PSD
Pu-238 production restart added to Technology account
NASA begins funding DOE Pu-238 infrastructure costs
Planetary Defense and Lunar Discovery & Exploration Program added
